entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
